  • Ortho

Class Ortho

Orthographic projection configuration for a Camera.

  • Located at Camera.ortho.
  • Works like Blender's orthographic projection, where the positions of the left, right, top and bottom planes are implicitly indicated with a single Ortho.scale property, which causes the frustum to be symmetrical on X and Y axis, large enough to contain the number of units given by Ortho.scale.
  • Ortho.near and Ortho.far indicated the distances to the clipping planes.
  • Ortho.onProjMatrix will fire an event whenever Ortho.projMatrix updates, which indicates that one or more other properties have updated.

    • Ortho

unproject

  • unproject(canvasPos: FloatArrayParam, screenZ: number, screenPos: FloatArrayParam, viewPos: FloatArrayParam, worldPos: FloatArrayParam): FloatArrayParam
    • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/view/camera/Ortho.ts:263

    Un-projects the given Canvas-space coordinates, using this Ortho projection.

    Parameters

    • canvasPos: FloatArrayParam

      Inputs 2D Canvas-space coordinates.

    • screenZ: number

      Inputs Screen-space Z coordinate.

    • screenPos: FloatArrayParam

      Outputs 3D Screen/Clip-space coordinates.

    • viewPos: FloatArrayParam

      Outputs un-projected 3D View-space coordinates.

    • worldPos: FloatArrayParam

      Outputs un-projected 3D World-space coordinates.

    Returns FloatArrayParam
